alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 6:07PM CDT until August 09 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 606 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clever, or near Highlandville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Clever, Sparta, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Oldfield, Elkhead, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Christian Center, Chadwick, Linden and Boaz. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
